{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant",
  "description": "HR-on-Wheels -&nbsp;Our client, a growing company in Ilupeju, Lagos, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to support their leadership team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Location:&nbsp;Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Executive Assistant will provide high-level administrative support to senior executives, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
	The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, highly organized, proactive, and able to manage multiple priorities effectively while maintaining confidentiality.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage executive schedules, appointments, and meetings.
	Prepare reports, correspondence, and presentations.
	Handle confidential information with discretion.
	Coordinate travel arrangements and logistics.
	Serve as the point of contact between executives and stakeholders.
	Perform general administrative duties as required.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration or a related field.
	2 - 4 years of proven experience as a Personal Assistant/Executive Assistant.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
	Excellent communication (written &amp; verbal) and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).


Salary
N200,000 / Month.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-07",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-22",

Executive Assistant Job at HR-on-Wheels




        
    

        
        HR-on-Wheels - Our client, a growing company in Ilupeju, Lagos, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to support their leadership team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Executive Assistant will provide high-level administrative support to senior executives, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
	The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, highly organized, proactive, and able to manage multiple priorities effectively while maintaining confidentiality.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage executive schedules, appointments, and meetings.
	Prepare reports, correspondence, and presentations.
	Handle confidential information with discretion.
	Coordinate travel arrangements and logistics.
	Serve as the point of contact between executives and stakeholders.
	Perform general administrative duties as required.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or a related field.
	2 - 4 years of proven experience as a Personal Assistant/Executive Assistant.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
	Excellent communication (written & verbal) and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).


Salary
N200,000 / Month.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Recruitment Officer Job at HR-on-Wheels
content:
HR-on-Wheels is a Human Resource consulting firm with focus to add value to the businesses of SMEs by emphazing the need to have a people strategy in place.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Officer

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Schedule: Hybrid

Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a proactive Recruitment Officer to manage the full recruitment lifecycle, from sourcing to onboarding.
	The ideal candidate will be skilled at building talent pipelines, engaging with stakeholders, and delivering timely, quality hires.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage end-to-end recruitment processes (sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding).
	Build and maintain a strong pipeline of qualified candidates.
	Partner with stakeholders to understand hiring needs and ensure timely placements.
	Source top talent through job boards, LinkedIn, referrals, and other channels.
	Track and report recruitment metrics for continuous improvement.
	Prepare and present recruitment progress reports to clients.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in recruitment.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and relationship management skills.
	Ability to manage multiple roles simultaneously with minimal supervision.
	Proficiency in using recruitment platforms and tools.


Salary
N120,000 monthly.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "2D Animator",
  "description": "HR-on-Wheels is a Human Resource consulting firm with focus to add value to the businesses of SMEs by emphazing the need to have a people strategy in place.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 2D Animator

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time&nbsp;(Hybrid &ndash; 3 days onsite, 2 days remote)

Job Description


	We&#39;re seeking creative storytellers with a strong portfolio and hands-on experience in Anime, motion graphics, and traditional animation.
	If you have a passion for bringing characters and stories to life, we&#39;d love to hear from you.


Qualification


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree.
	2 &ndash; 3 years of professional animation experience.
	Proficiency in Adobe Animate, Clip Studio, or similar animation tools.
	Working knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
	Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively.
	A standout portfolio that highlights your animation range and storytelling ability.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Note:&nbsp;Candidates should reside in or near Yaba and the surrounding areas and must be available to resume next week.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-31",

2D Animator Job at HR-on-Wheels




        
    

        
        HR-on-Wheels is a Human Resource consulting firm with focus to add value to the businesses of SMEs by emphazing the need to have a people strategy in place.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 2D Animator

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid – 3 days onsite, 2 days remote)

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking creative storytellers with a strong portfolio and hands-on experience in Anime, motion graphics, and traditional animation.
	If you have a passion for bringing characters and stories to life, we'd love to hear from you.


Qualification


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree.
	2 – 3 years of professional animation experience.
	Proficiency in Adobe Animate, Clip Studio, or similar animation tools.
	Working knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
	Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively.
	A standout portfolio that highlights your animation range and storytelling ability.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Note: Candidates should reside in or near Yaba and the surrounding areas and must be available to resume next week.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Front Desk Officer",
  "description": "Cash 24 Group of Companies is&nbsp;a dynamic and versatile company offering a broad spectrum of services across various industries. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth, we provide comprehensive solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses, investors, and individuals.

As a private limited liability company, we prioritise security, integrity, and reliability&mdash;making us a trusted partner for your ventures and investments.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikoyi, Lagos

Job Summary


	As part of our team, you&#39;ll have the chance to work on exciting projects and collaborate with some of the most innovative minds in the industry.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Benefits


	We offer competitive salaries, comprehensive benefits packages, and opportunities for growth and advancement.


Interview Date:
9th October 2025.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and cover letter to:&nbsp;Cash24nig@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;For inquiries, contact us via WhatsApp at 08038693394.",

Front Desk Officer Job at Cash 24 Group of Companies




        
    

        
        Cash 24 Group of Companies is a dynamic and versatile company offering a broad spectrum of services across various industries. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth, we provide comprehensive solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of businesses, investors, and individuals.

As a private limited liability company, we prioritise security, integrity, and reliability—making us a trusted partner for your ventures and investments.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As part of our team, you'll have the chance to work on exciting projects and collaborate with some of the most innovative minds in the industry.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Benefits


	We offer competitive salaries, comprehensive benefits packages, and opportunities for growth and advancement.


Interview Date:
9th October 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and cover letter to: Cash24nig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For inquiries, contact us via WhatsApp at 08038693394.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Managing Director",
  "description": "Mecer Consulting Limited is a world class Business consulting firm with specialty in SME consulting, Human Capital Development and Business Growth, Business Re-engineering, Merger and Acquisition. Our services include; but not limited to: Workforce Development, ISO certification (QMS, EMS, FSMS, ITMS, MDQMS etc), Complete Business solution services (IT), BDSP, Project financing, Business&nbsp;plan development, Project Management, Business Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of 7 - 10 years of senior management experience in Banking/Finance (Microfinance experience highly preferred).
	Proven track record of developing and implementing business strategies in the financial sector.
	Strong knowledge of CBN Microfinance regulations, risk management, and compliance.
	Excellent stakeholder management skills, including regulators, investors, and customers.
	Strong customer and banking network.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@mecer.consulting&nbsp;using &quot;CMO&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Managing Director Job at Mecer Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Mecer Consulting Limited is a world class Business consulting firm with specialty in SME consulting, Human Capital Development and Business Growth, Business Re-engineering, Merger and Acquisition. Our services include; but not limited to: Workforce Development, ISO certification (QMS, EMS, FSMS, ITMS, MDQMS etc), Complete Business solution services (IT), BDSP, Project financing, Business plan development, Project Management, Business Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Minimum of 7 - 10 years of senior management experience in Banking/Finance (Microfinance experience highly preferred).
	Proven track record of developing and implementing business strategies in the financial sector.
	Strong knowledge of CBN Microfinance regulations, risk management, and compliance.
	Excellent stakeholder management skills, including regulators, investors, and customers.
	Strong customer and banking network.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@mecer.consulting using "CMO" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
